page.title: 04Churches in Stone & Oulton
page.content: Anglican Christ Church is situated off Radford Street.The vicar, the Rev.John Williams, lives at Christ Church Vicarage which is in Broomfield Court. He is also the vicar of St.John's Church, Oulton. Christ Church was built of brick in the last two decades of the 19th century.There is also the Abbey Chapel in Oulton Abbey. Details of the Parish Church are on page 5. Roman Catholic The Church of the Immaculate Conception is in Margaret Street.The parish priest is Fr. Pinkman who lives in Station Rd. NonConformist St. John's Church is a United Reformed Church built in 1871 in the style of the 13th century.This church is also a Methodist Church led by Rev. Derek Cooper of The Manse, Granville Terrace.
